it.graphitech.trafficSimulator.renderable.kml

Class KMLController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.avlist.AVListImpl
      • gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObjectImpl
        • it.graphitech.trafficSimulator.renderable.kml.KMLController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gov.nasa.worldwind.avlist.AVList, gov.nasa.worldwind.event.MessageListener, gov.nasa.worldwind.render.PreRenderable, gov.nasa.worldwind.render.Renderable, gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObject, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class KMLController
extends gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObjectImpl
implements gov.nasa.worldwind.render.PreRenderable, gov.nasa.worldwind.render.Renderable, gov.nasa.worldwind.event.MessageListener
    Executes the mapping from KML to World Wind. Traverses a parsed KML document and creates the appropriate World Wind object to represent the KML.
